intro.p1: Hello! I'm a full-stack developer with diverse experience from backend to frontend.
intro.p2: I primarily use Spring Boot and React, and I'm passionate about learning new technologies.
intro.p3: I value both user experience and code quality, aiming to develop efficient and scalable web services.
